name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions, specializing in **.NET**, **.NET Core**, **MVC**, and **Entity Framework**. Proven track record of building robust APIs and microservices architecture, ensuring seamless integration and functionality. Highly proficient with **PostGreSQL** for database management and effective data handling. Experienced in leveraging **Firebase** for real-time applications and managing application performance. Adept at utilizing **Swagger** for API documentation, enhancing developer interaction and project efficiency. 
In addition to backend expertise, skilled in delivering solutions in the healthcare and finance sectors using modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Demonstrated hands-on experience with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** across the full stack, delivering secure, maintainable solutions compliant with standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Capable of leading the development of enterprise platforms and embedding AI/ML capabilities for enhanced analytics and decision-making. Passionate about building systems that deliver meaningful impact.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed and optimized microservices architectures using **.NET**, **.Net Core**, and **MVC**, ensuring high performance and scalability for backend services in healthcare and finance sectors.
•	Implemented robust APIs integrated with **Swagger** for clear documentation and testing, enhancing developer experience and interaction with service endpoints.
•	Designed complex data models and conducted database management with **PostgreSQL**, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval for applications handling millions of records.
•	Utilized **Entity Framework** for seamless database operations, streamlining CRUD functionalities and optimizing query performance by **30%**.
•	Led the migration of monolithic applications to microservices infrastructure, achieving a **40%** reduction in deployment time and improving system resilience through service isolation.
•	Managed cloud functions and real-time data processing using **Firebase**, enhancing the scalability of mobile and web applications.
•	Established continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices, reducing deployment times by **50%** using modern DevOps tools within the microservices ecosystem.
•	Collaborated with front-end teams to integrate backend solutions with user interfaces while ensuring adherence to security protocols and data privacy regulations.
•	Implemented comprehensive unit and integration testing frameworks to ensure code quality and reliability across **100%** of deployed services.
•	Contributed to architectural discussions, promoting best practices in software development and advocating for the adoption of microservices and cloud-native strategies.

- Designed and implemented robust RESTful APIs using **.NET** and **.NET Core** to facilitate efficient communication between microservices in a highly scalable architecture.
- Developed and maintained applications utilizing **ASP.NET MVC** framework to ensure high performance and responsiveness in backend processing for financial services.
- Optimized database interactions by leveraging **Entity Framework** with **PostgreSQL** for effective data management, improving query performance by up to **30%**.
- Integrated and documented APIs using **Swagger**, allowing for seamless onboarding of front-end and mobile developers with clear guidance on API endpoints and functionalities.
- Transitioned legacy systems to a microservices architecture, enhancing maintainability and scalability, reducing system downtime by **25%** during peak transaction periods.
- Enhanced data security and retrieval speeds by employing **PostgreSQL** as a primary database in conjunction with effective indexing strategies, achieving a **40%** improvement in data access times.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on system architecture using API-first design principles, streamlining development workflows through better integration of **Firebase**.
- Championed best practices in development, ensuring clean and maintainable code following industry standards for software development and deployment.

Developed and maintained robust **.NET** and **.NET Core** backend services with a focus on **Microservices** architecture, enhancing application scalability and maintainability within a high-volume e-commerce platform.
Engineered RESTful APIs using **MVC** design patterns and documented them with **Swagger** for seamless integration with frontend applications and third-party services.
Leveraged **Entity Framework** to streamline database interactions and optimize performance, ensuring efficient data retrieval from **PostgreSQL** under heavy traffic conditions.
Implemented real-time data processing and API responses, resulting in a **30%** improvement in user engagement metrics through reduced latency and increased service availability.
Designed and executed performance monitoring strategies, leading to a **40%** decrease in downtime during peak traffic by utilizing cloud solutions and load balancing techniques.
Collaborated closely with frontend development teams, aligning the API and architectural frameworks to deliver a consistent user experience across devices and platforms.
Focused on enhancing code quality and maintainability through comprehensive unit and integration testing, achieving **98%** test coverage on critical backend functionalities.
Championed best practices in security, implementing role-based access control (RBAC) and robust API authentication methods to secure user data and maintain GDPR compliance.
Conducted system architecture reviews and code audits on a bi-weekly basis to ensure adherence to standards and continuous improvement in the delivery pipeline.
